item.title: CIT manuals
item.description: The following documents are developed to help the teachers to conduct workshop with the help of CIT application. This app is available on google playstore: The program is open source and you can download or fork it. Fork Download Follow @skgadi Practice 1 Practice 2 Practice 3 Practice 4 Practice 5 Practice 6

item.title: Father's day on 2017
item.description: Tishya’s voice recorded on the father’s day of 2017. Tishya wishing happy father’s day Tishya conveying her love

item.title: Implementation of basic waveforms used in control systems
item.description: The control theory uses the following waveforms. Step Square Rectangular Sine Triangular Sawtooth There are several techniques to produce these inputs. This post presents an easy way of creating and testing them. Note that the functions presented here are easy to implement but not always efficient. Generalized step function $S_0(t)$ A step wave has only two states and changes from one state to another at a single instance of time.

item.title: Participation in SACS-2017
item.description: Suresh Kumar Gadi gave a plenary talk on real-time computing and conducted a workshop on Solving mathematical equations with the help of genetic algorithms at the 1st Symposium on Applied Computer Science (SACS-2017).

item.title: One day workshop on LaTeX
item.description: This workshop presents an introduction to the programming language LaTeX for the first time users.
